response.explain: The previous action was successful and there was no error. The oven was closed with the pie inside. The next step is to turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the pie out of the fridge.
(4) Close the fridge.
(5) Move the robot to the oven.
(6) Put the pie in the oven.
(7) Close the oven.
(8) Turn on the oven to heat the pie.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 8: Turn on the oven to heat the pie
    oven = registry(env, "oven_wuinhm_0")
    toggle_on(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
